step: Choose a steak to grill.
Find a rub recipe from a cookbook or online.
Make the rub.
Apply the rub to the steak.
Let the steak rest.
Grill the steak.
Finished.

step: Place all of the ingredients into a mixing bowl.
Mix to combine thoroughly.
Sprinkle the rub across the steak.
Cook the steak as usual.
